full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO'I RJES GNANG BCU GSUM JI LTAR BYA TSUL SKAL BZANG MGUL RGYAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @061A *, ,(DPAL MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I RJES GNANG BCU GSUM JI LTAR BYA BA'I TSUL CHA TSANG BA GO BDE BAR BKOD PA 'DI NI, MDO SNGAGS RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN CHOS MDZAD BLO BZANG MKHAS BTZUN GYIS, YANG NAS YANG DU NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, DRUG PA RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHAL SNGA NAS, BKA' DRIN MTSUNGS MED SLOB DPON RIN PO CHE DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO GNYIS KYIS BKA' DRIN GYIS NYE BAR 'TSO BA SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYI MING CAN GYIS, YIG CHA MANG PO'I GUNG SGRIGS BLA MA GONG MA'I ZHAL SHES DANG, PHYAG LEN GYI MAN NGAG GIS RGYAN TE, SHIN TU GSAL BAR PHYOGS GCIG TU BKOD PA 'DI LA, BLA MA MGON PO 'KHOR BCAS KYIS BZOD PAR BZHES NAS, BDAG LA SGRIB PAR MI 'GYUR BAR MDZAD DU GSOL, CES PA'I YI GE PA NI BLO BZANG DNGOS GRUB BO, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYI MING CAN,
